object.name: ConfigurablePODTemplate
object.property:
<model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema" xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" i18n:domain="collective.documentgenerator"> <schema based-on="collective.documentgenerator.content.pod_template.IConfigurablePODTemplate">
<field name="mailing_lists" type="zope.schema.Text"> <title i18n:translate="">mailing_lists</title> <description i18n:translate="">mailing_lists_descr</description> <required>False</required> </field>
<field name="store_as_annex" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <title i18n:translate="">store_as_annex</title> <description i18n:translate="">store_as_annex_descr</description> <required>False</required> <vocabulary>Products.PloneMeeting.vocabularies.storepodtemplateasannexvocabulary</vocabulary> </field>
<field name="store_as_annex_title_expr" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <title i18n:translate="">store_as_annex_title_expr</title> <description i18n:translate="">store_as_annex_title_expr_descr</description> <required>False</required> </field>
<field name="store_as_annex_empty_file" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <title i18n:translate="">store_as_annex_empty_file</title> <description i18n:translate="">store_as_annex_empty_file_descr</description> <default>False</default> <required>False</required> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"></form:widget> </field>
</schema> </model>
